languages.text: Лица офицеров полны спокойствия и уверенности, один за другим они склоняют головы и складывают знак аквилы на груди. Вскоре они покидают медотсек и отправляются исправлять ситуацию на борту.

traits.locale_text: Лица офицеров полны спокойствия и уверенности. Они покидают медотсек и Лорда-капитана и отправляются исправлять ситуацию на борту.

languages.text: The officers' faces are calm and confident. One by one, they bow their heads, their hands forming the sign of the Aquila on their chests. They soon leave the medbay to deal with the situation on board.
languages.original_text: Лица офицеров полны спокойствия и уверенности, один за другим они склоняют головы и складывают знак аквилы на груди. Вскоре они покидают медотсек и отправляются исправлять ситуацию на борту.

traits.locale_text: The officers' faces are calm and confident. One by one, they bow their heads, their hands forming the Sign of the Aquila on their chests. They soon leave the medbay to deal with the situation on board.

The officers' faces are calm and confident. One by one, they bow their heads, their hands forming the sign of the Aquila on their chests. They soon leave the medbay to deal with the situation on board.

languages.text: Las expresiones de los oficiales son tranquilas y confiadas. De uno en uno, inclinan la cabeza y forman el símbolo del Aquila sobre sus pechos con las manos. Dejan la sala médica para atender la situación a bordo.
languages.original_text: The officers' faces are calm and confident. One by one, they bow their heads, their hands forming the sign of the Aquila on their chests. They soon leave the medbay to deal with the situation on board.

traits.locale_text: Las expresiones de los oficiales son tranquilas y confiadas. De uno en uno, inclinan la cabeza y forman el símbolo del Aquila sobre sus pechos con las manos. Dejan la sala médica para atender la situación a bordo.

languages.text: 军官们的脸色变得平静而充满信心。他们一个接一个地低下了头，用双手在胸前比了个帝国双头鹰的手势，之后很快就离开了医疗甲板，开始着手处理舰船上的情况。
languages.original_text: The officers' faces are calm and confident. One by one, they bow their heads, their hands forming the sign of the Aquila on their chests. They soon leave the medbay to deal with the situation on board.

traits.locale_text: 军官们的脸色变得平静而充满信心。他们一个接一个地低下了头，用双手在胸前比了个帝国双头鹰的手势，之后很快就离开了医疗甲板，开始着手处理舰船上的情况。

languages.text: 士官の顔は穏やかで自信に満ちている。ひとりずつ頭を下げて、両手で胸にアクィラの印を作った。士官達は船内の状況に対処するべく、すぐに医療ベイを離れた。
languages.original_text: The officers' faces are calm and confident. One by one, they bow their heads, their hands forming the sign of the Aquila on their chests. They soon leave the medbay to deal with the situation on board.

traits.locale_text: 士官の顔は穏やかで自信に満ちている。ひとりずつ頭を下げて、両手で胸にアクィラの印を作った。士官達は船内の状況に対処するべく、すぐに医療ベイを離れた。

languages.text: Die Gesichter der Offiziere sind ruhig und zuversichtlich. Einer nach dem anderen verneigt sich, die Hände formen das Zeichen des Adlers auf der Brust. Wenig später verlassen sie die Krankenstation, um sich um die Situation an Bord zu kümmern.
languages.original_text: The officers' faces are calm and confident. One by one, they bow their heads, their hands forming the sign of the Aquila on their chests. They soon leave the medbay to deal with the situation on board.

languages.text: Les subalternes arborent une expression calme et confiante. Un par un, ils inclinent la tête tout en formant de leurs mains le signe de l'Aquila sur leur poitrine, puis ils quittent l'infirmerie pour remédier à la situation du vaisseau.
languages.original_text: The officers' faces are calm and confident. One by one, they bow their heads, their hands forming the sign of the Aquila on their chests. They soon leave the medbay to deal with the situation on board.

traits.locale_text: Les subalternes arborent une expression calme et confiante. Un par un, ils inclinent la tête tout en formant de leurs mains le signe de l'Aquila sur leur poitrine, puis ils quittent l'infirmerie pour remédier à la situation du vaisseau.

languages.text: Subaylar sakin ve kendilerinden emin. Teker teker başlarını eğip elleriyle göğüslerinde Çift Başlı Kartal işareti yapıyorlar. Hemen ardından gemideki durumla ilgilenmek için revirden ayrılıyorlar.
languages.original_text: The officers' faces are calm and confident. One by one, they bow their heads, their hands forming the sign of the Aquila on their chests. They soon leave the medbay to deal with the situation on board.

traits.locale_text: Subaylar sakin ve kendilerinden emin. Teker teker başlarını eğiyor ve elleriyle göğüslerinde Çift Başlı Kartal işareti yapıyorlar. Kısa süre sonra gemideki durumla ilgilenmek için revirden ayrılıyorlar.
